Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/optimizephis-cpp/#l00049">49</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/optimizephis-cpp">OptimizePHIs.cpp</a>.

### IsSingleValuePHICycle() {#a6437ddf1189c6ab703579fc870292b5f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool OptimizePHIs::IsSingleValuePHICycle (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI, unsigned &amp; SingleValReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">InstrSet</a> &amp; PHIsInCycle)</>}>
IsSingleValuePHICycle - Check if MI is a PHI where all the source operands are copies of SingleValReg, possibly via copies through other PHIs.

If SingleValReg is zero on entry, it is set to the register with the single non-copy value. PHIsInCycle is a set used to keep track of the PHIs that have been scanned. PHIs may be grouped by cycle, several cycles or chains.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/optimizephis-cpp/#l00047">47</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/optimizephis-cpp">OptimizePHIs.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### OptimizeBB() {#a5ff4c3ea103a6adec90964a97be1bbcb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool OptimizePHIs::OptimizeBB (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB)</>}>
OptimizeBB - Remove dead PHI cycles and PHI cycles that can be replaced by a single value.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/optimizephis-cpp/#l00050">50</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/optimizephis-cpp">OptimizePHIs.cpp</a>.
